titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Pittsburg State University Gorillas football team for winning the 2011 NCAA Division II Football Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/31/2012--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the Pittsburg State University Gorillas football team for winning the 2011 NCAA Division II Football Championship.
